settings.content1:
Our journey started with a profound commitment to helping people experiencing UTIs. We quickly realized that there were numerous unmet needs in the area of pelvic health, for women of all ages and stages of life.

With so much misinformation out there, we saw the need to create a company that offers both high-quality supplements and an educational platform to our customers so that they can make informed decisions.

Every product and service we provide is designed to help women naturally manage this very important area of health, and we are here to help you get back to living your best life, naturally.

We believe that “an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure” (Benjamin Franklin).
settings.bar_text: Today, Utiva is a leader in all things pelvic health and it is our only area of focus.
settings.content2: We apply the rigor of science and technology to the genius of nature, so that we can develop products that are completely natural and actually work. We’re committed to:

settings.quote: I still remember hearing the difficult news that my grandma passed away at the young age of 51. With UTIs being a taboo subject, inconvenient access to care and her own ignorance, she neglected her UTI symptoms. As a result, she lost one of her kidneys and had severe complications since.
settings.name: Faraz

settings.quote: I was on the other side of the world while my wife was hospitalized. Before she left for her trip, she was prescribed antibiotics to treat a UTI. Little did we know, she was resistant to that antibiotic and the infection ended up traveling to her kidneys - all while I was unable to be there and help her.
settings.name: Derek

settings.title: UTIs hit close to home in a real way
Powered by nature
settings.content: We are a mission-driven company with big dreams of bringing clinically effective natural solutions to health and wellness in order to create a better balance within modern medicine.

settings.title: Lead with science
settings.content: We make evidence-based decisions for every product we bring to market. This means rigorous review of clinical data and vetting processes with doctors and experts.

settings.title: Education
settings.content: We believe that education = better choices which lead to better health outcomes. We are committed to providing you with accurate information so that you can make informed decisions for your health.

settings.title: Customers first
settings.content: We are fully committed to successful outcomes for each and every one of our customers - it's our mantra and every Utiva team member is empowered to always do what is right for our customers.
The year we set out to make UTI prevention an accessible reality
Customers we are helping take back control of their wellness
The number of healthcare professionals that trust UTIVA for their patients

settings.text: As part of our advocacy for better health, Utiva donates a portion of proceeds to a group of charitable organizations, including Saving Mothers and Essentials First.
These organizations promote education and awareness about reproductive and sexual health, as well as preventable diseases in both adults and children through access to hygienic products.

settings.title: Learning center
settings.subtitle: Your go-to resource for pelvic health education.

settings.name: Alaina Mills
settings.title: I am so thankful for this product!
settings.description: About 3 years ago I started getting UTIs. I went from having a UTI here and there to having Chronic UTIs. Ever since I started taking Utiva a couple of months ago, I haven’t had any infections and my bladder health feels more secure and protected. I am so thankful for this product, and I am definitely going to stay on it for the rest of my life.

settings.name: Nannette
settings.title: I recommend this product
settings.description: I started these pills on the advice of my urologist and they certainly have helped. I found out that they could be purchased directly from the company and have been so pleased. Customer service is excellent with all the updated emails regarding notification of upcoming orders, shipment and potential date of delivery of the product. Would not buy these pills anywhere else. Excellent

settings.name: Anonymous
settings.title: Pleasantly surprised!
settings.description: I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly I started noticing changes. Within the first few weeks I noticed less urgency and frequency in needing the bathroom. Symptoms have continued to improve at the 3 month mark now and I am very happy!! A quality product with excellent results and quick shipping.
